title: Poha Oatmeal Health Mix Recipe for Babies - Instant Cereal Mix for Babies
content:
Healthy and nutritious poha oatmeal porridge mix for babies. It is rich in the carb, protein, and fat which makes a great breakfast for babies.

Poha Oatmeal Health Mix for Babies - Instant Cereal Mix for Babies

 

Preparation time

10 mins

 

Cook time

5 mins

 

Total time

15 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1¼ cup

 

Ingredients

Poha / Flattened Rice - ½ cup

Oatmeal - ½ cup

Roasted Gram Dal - ¼ cup

Cashews - 6 to 8

 

FOR PORRIDGE:

Poha oatmeal powder - 2 tablespoon

Water - ½ cup or as needed

Sweetener as needed

Instructions

Roast poha and oats and cool it down.

Roast gram dal and cashews till golden and remove to a bowl and cool it down.

Take it in a blender and powder finely.

Store in an airtight container.

While making porridge, add some powder in a saucepan. add water and cook till thickened.

Add sweetener and mix well.

feed your baby.

recommendations.title: Healthy Vegetable Stir Fry Recipe for Kids and Toddlers
recommendations.content: This is a great dish to include veggies in your little one's diet. You can add whatever veggies you like in this. The addition of nuts powder in this makes it more tasty and healthy for your kids. You can serve this with rice or use it as a filling in paratha or use it as a filling for roti rolls

recommendations.title: Keerai Dosa Recipe, Spinach Dosa for babies, Toddlers & Kids
recommendations.content:
Healthy spinach dosa which tastes so yummy and is so nutritious for your baby. This dosa is a green color with tons of health benefits in them.
This is an easy way to include spinach in your toddler or kid's diet. They will never find it and still, they will enjoy eating green dosa.

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
